title: Motion sensor doesn't work in Bangladesh it says it's not supported in your country. How come?
content: I am on holiday in Bangladesh and some functions are not available in this country it's strange that motion sensor doesn't work or smart awake ...why is that ...this is putting me off from pixel 4xl if I can't use this sensor in some countries what's the point of using a mobile phone ...might as well stick to landline which I can't move ...really annoying issue must be sorted .
